name: Highway Police Parking Car 3D
description:
Welcome to Fast Police Car Highway Police Parking Car 3D you’re a new police recruit, & getting trained for the police parking in police station after chasing down the most dangerous outlaws of the city. Skill Parking Police Station 2017 Make the criminals pay for their crime. Real Police Car Parking crazy driving to experience how it is to be a cop behind the wheel and park the police cars perfectly in the challenging environments of the police station. Successful complete the police parking missions to complete your training. You are a cop in training in this game and you have to complete the training of your combat skills, criminal chase, hand to hand fight and shooting, driving the modern police cars and developing the parking skills. Crazy Police Parking You’ll be put up to various trials and tasks of the police parking game. Particularly on the off chance that you have to drive your police car through exceptional outlined levels and stopping challenges that will push you to drive the Police car till the cutoff of your understanding
• Professional car parking consist of many parking missions.
• Perplexing Driving challenges are for the expert drivers
• run the powerful police cars with the great engines
• 20 exciting missions of extreme police car parking
• Realistic controls and navigation which is consisted of the steering wheel, brake, acceleration and manual transmission handle.
